question: Question
company-info-sub-title: Enter information about the company (team, firm).

date-sub-title: Please write what date, what time and how long the interviews will last, so that I can plan my time in advance, thank you.

attention-sub-title: In connection with the increasing incidence of unscrupulous pseudo-recruiters and similar individuals, please show your interest by transferring a minimum amount of $ 10 to one of the specified details.

notification-success: Your message has been sent successfully.
